resources.string: By just giving us phone number, event date and type of event, we know what kind of lovely message to send for you
We ensure your wishes to your friends and loved ones get to them on time; even without your knowledge
Always forget to send your wishes to friends? Don\'t worry; that\'s why we are here.
Special Wishes is an app developed by Dulceprime Inc. to automatically send your wishes to friend, family and loved ones.
